Uses of Interface
io.netty5.channel.MaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator

  • Packages that use MaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator 
    Package Description
    io.netty5.channel
    The core channel API which is asynchronous and event-driven abstraction of various transports such as a NIO Channel.
    io.netty5.channel.kqueue
    BSD specific transport.

    • Uses of MaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator in io.netty5.channel

      Classes in io.netty5.channel that implement MaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AdaptiveRecvBufferAllocator
      The RecvBufferAllocator that automatically increases and decreases the predicted buffer size on feed back.
      class  DefaultMaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator
      Default implementation of MaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator which respects ChannelOption.AUTO_READ and also prevents overflow.
      class  FixedRecvBufferAllocator
      The RecvBufferAllocator that always yields the same buffer size prediction.
      class  ServerChannelRecvBufferAllocator
      MaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator implementation which should be used for ServerChannels.
      Methods in io.netty5.channel that return MaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator DefaultMaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator.maxMessagesPerRead​(int maxMessagesPerRead)  
      MaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator MaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator.maxMessagesPerRead​(int maxMessagesPerRead)
      Sets the maximum number of messages to read per read loop.

    • Uses of MaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator in io.netty5.channel.kqueue

      Classes in io.netty5.channel.kqueue that implement MaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  KQueueGuessRecvBufferAllocator
      DefaultMaxMessagesRecvBufferAllocator which always try to allocate buffers as big as kqueue tells us in terms of pending bytes to read.
